laws_referenced: Land Reforms Act, II of 1977; Punjab Land Reforms Rules, 1977

issues.choice_of_area_surrendered: Dispute over land surrendered in village Walla Rai versus village Jhalar Mehr Shah
issues.calculation_of_p_i_units: Claim of incorrect calculation and soil classification

petitioner.choice_of_area: Requested resumption of 1436 P.I. Units from village Jhalar Mehr Shah and 500 P.I. Units from village Walla Rai
petitioner.calculation_error: Claimed incorrect calculation of P.I. Units and soil classification

findings.choice_of_area: Original declaration form indicated surrender of land in village Walla Rai; petition rejected on this point
findings.calculation_error: Deputy Land Commissioner directed to review records and report if necessary

directions.review_records: Deputy Land Commissioner to review relevant records in presence of petitioner or counsel
